## SamplingLogger.shouldSample() method

判断是否应该记录此日志

**Signature:**

```typescript
shouldSample(key: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | 日志标识 |

**Returns:**

boolean

true 记录，false 跳过
